Login.emailNotReceived: Didn't receive it? Check your spam folder.
Login.emailSentBody: We sent you a login link. Click the link in the email to sign in.

verify.body: Please click the button below to complete the login process. This ensures that you are a real user.
verify.errorBody: The login link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new link.
verify.redirectError: The redirect could not be executed safely. Please try again or copy the link manually.
verify.title: Verify your login

api.aboutDesc: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) allows AI assistants like Claude Desktop to programmatically interact with your team data. Generate an API key to enable this integration.
api.description: Model Context Protocol Server for AI Integration
api.noKeysDesc: Generate a key to get started with MCP integration.
api.proRequired: MCP API Access is a PRO Feature
api.proRequiredDesc: Upgrade to PRO for programmatic API access and integration with AI assistants like Claude Desktop.
api.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.
api.saveKeyWarning: Save this key now! It will only be shown once.
api.title: MCP Server API

captainCannotLeave: You are a Captain! Please promote a successor first or delete the team to leave.
changeBoatSizeConfirm: Are you sure you want to change the boat size? The current lineup will be cleared.

features: Team Visibility: New 'Show on Website' setting allows teams to be displayed on the public landing page as a reference.
technical: Database: Added 'showOnWebsite' field to Team model.
API: New public function to retrieve visible teams.
SEO: Converted landing page to Server Component for better search engine indexing.
Performance: Implemented Next.js Image Component for automatic image optimization.
Security: Implemented DoS protection (50-team limit), production logging, and URL validation for team websites.
Architecture: Eliminated code duplication by consolidating public teams query logic.
bugfixes: Build: Fixed next-intl API import (setRequestLocale instead of unstable_setRequestLocale).
Fix: Resolved React key collisions by using team.id instead of team.name.
Fix: Corrected TypeScript null-safety for team.website attribute.

features: Team List: Added search, filter by skills, and sort functionality to better manage large squads.
Login Verification: Protection against email scanners via landing page.
technical: Security: Implemented Open Redirect protection in VerifyView.
i18n: Synchronized language files.
Drag & Drop Performance: Optimized rendering cycles by implementing React.memo and useCallback.
Reduced re-renders in planner mode for smoother mobile experience.
bugfixes: Fix: Resolved scroll lock issue where scrolling remained blocked after closing modals (e.g., Add Guest).

technical: MCP Session Store: Sessions are now persisted in the database for multi-server compatibility.
Automatic Cleanup: Daily cronjob removes expired MCP sessions (older than 24h).
Performance Cache: 10-second in-memory cache for session lookups reduces database queries.
Error Resilience: Retry logic for transient database errors (connection timeout, etc.).
Security: API keys are hashed (SHA256) before storing in the session table.

bugfixes: Fix: Resolved infinite loop when fetching paddler data (reduces network load and memory usage).

features: iCal Integration: Automatically sync your team with external calendars (e.g., Kadermanager).
Sync History: Detailed logs for all sync runs are now viewable directly in Team Settings.
Automatic Sync: Daily background updates for your events.
Help Center Optimized: iCal sync documentation moved to 'Manage Events' for better discoverability.
technical: New sync logging system for improved diagnostics.
Optimized iCal processing for more stable synchronization.

features: SEO Update: Improved sitemap and structured data for better discoverability on Google.
Google Icon: App icon is now correctly displayed in Google search results.
Sitemap expanded: All legal and help pages are now indexed.
technical: Enabled indexing for /docs and /help pages.
Implemented JSON-LD Structured Data Schema.

bugfixes: Fix: Corrected account balance display (credit is now positive, debt is negative).

features: Added account balance display on the billing page.
Added notice for small open amounts below the minimum charge threshold.
bugfixes: Fix: Missing payment method for subscriptions with 0‚Ç¨ initial charge is now correctly displayed via fallback to customer data.
Fix: Critical error during subscription creation resolved (Stripe Product ID support).

technical: Refactored PRO benefits: The list is now loaded dynamically from translation files.
bugfixes: Fix: Added missing translations in the PRO upgrade view (Premium Badge & benefits).

technical: Code hygiene: Removed debug logs, added missing translations.
bugfixes: Fix: Corrected automatic redirect after team creation.
Fix: Profile completion (onboarding) now validates role selection.

features: GDPR-compliant consent: Mandatory checkboxes for Terms/Privacy and withdrawal waiver at checkout.
Legal traceability: Consent timestamps are now stored in Stripe subscriptions.
technical: Refactored localization for legal texts (Terms, Privacy, Imprint, DPA).
Improved backend support for direct Stripe coupon IDs.
bugfixes: Fix: Coupon codes are now correctly recognized and applied.
Fix: Subscriptions are now reliably reset after cancellation.
Fix: The 'Change Payment Method' window is now correctly displayed in dark mode.
The display now automatically adjusts to Light or Dark mode.

features: Modern Design: The entire app has been visually refreshed.
Improved Lists: Mobile-optimized view and clear pagination.
Event Details: Compact cards that show more info when needed.
Participant Privacy: Paddlers now only see relevant participant lists.
technical: UI and loading screen optimizations.
bugfixes: Various fixes for overlapping elements and spacing.
Improved display across different screen sizes.

technical: Stability and performance improvements.
Optimized data synchronization.
bugfixes: Fix: Corrected scrollbar in dark mode.
Fix: Resolved Pro status display issues.
Fix: Resolved error message display issues.

features: Promo Codes: Support for promotion codes during upgrade.
Better Subscription Overview: Clear status and duration display.
Payment Management: Easier updates for payment details.
technical: Improved integration with the payment provider.
bugfixes: Fix: Correct display of periods in subscription history.

features: Better Notifications: Automatic info on payment issues.
Reminders: Warning before trial expiration.
Management Portal: Direct link to subscription management.
technical: Technical optimization of notification systems.

features: Enhanced Help Section: New guides for AI integration.
PRO Benefits: AI features are now more prominently featured.
technical: Stability improvements for AI connectivity.
bugfixes: Resolved various page loading errors.

features: AI Expansion: New features for boat planning.
Security: New management for team keys.
technical: Refactoring of internal security structure.
bugfixes: Minor fixes to technical documentation.

features: PRO Subscription: Unlimited members and exclusive features.
Team Colors: Choose your team look from various colors.
Easy Payments: Support for Credit Card, SEPA, PayPal, and more.
Design Upgrade: Dynamic colors and modernized icons.
Personalized Boat: Your team logo directly at the boat tip.
Fast Team Switching: Improved navigation between multiple teams.
Improved Import: Clear warnings when reaching limits.
technical: Centralized design system for consistent colors.
Improved data synchronization.
bugfixes: Fix: Consistent colors across the entire app.
Fix: Resolved linking display issues in the member list.

features: Mail Queue System: A new robust system ensures reliable background email delivery.
Error Pages: User-friendly 404 and error pages.
Tour Sync: Your tour progress is now saved to your profile and synced across devices.
technical: SEO Optimization: Improved keywords and metadata for better discoverability.
Database Cleanup: Removed legacy email logs and replaced them with a centralized queuing system.
bugfixes: Tour Fix: The interactive tour now starts correctly on the team dashboard and checks for an active team.
UI Fix: Prevented screen flickering on reload by immediately applying theme and language settings.

technical: Database: Added indexes to Event, Paddler, Attendance, and Assignment tables for better query performance.
API: Optimized statistics and event data fetching to reduce database load.
bugfixes: Admin Dashboard: Fixed an issue where 'Recent Events' displayed team names instead of event titles.

features: Magic AI Optimization: Heavier (and often taller) paddlers are now prioritized for the middle of the boat.
New Special Role 'Stroke': Paddlers with this role are prioritized for the first row by the AI.
New Special Role 'Preferred Steer': These paddlers take precedence on the steering position.
Prioritization: Confirmed attendances are now strictly prioritized over 'Maybes', guests, and canisters.
Smart Canisters: Canisters are only used if they improve balance; otherwise, their usage is minimized.
Row Optimization: The AI prioritizes full rows. Single paddlers and canisters are preferably placed towards the back of the boat.
Help & FAQ updated.
bugfixes: Fix: Special roles (Stroke, Steer) are now preserved during profile updates.

features: New Admin Dashboard: Comprehensive statistics and system metrics for administrators.
Growth Charts: Interactive charts for user and team growth with toggleable timeframes (30 Days / 6 Months).
Advanced Stats: Display of active sessions and sent emails.
technical: Database: Added 'createdAt' field for users for better historical analysis.
API: Optimized statistics queries with server-side aggregation.
Performance: Independent loading of charts and metrics.

features: New: Excel Import! Easily import complete teams and event schedules via Excel or CSV files.
Edit Events: You can now modify title, date, time and other details of existing events.
More Details: Record specific times and comments for your training sessions.
Mobile Optimization: Profile and Team menus now open as centered popups for better usability on small screens.
bugfixes: Fixed issue where imported event comments were not displayed.
Fixed save icon in event modal.

features: UI Optimization: Renamed 'Plan' button for paddlers to 'View Plan'.
technical: Security Update: Comprehensive permission checks for all API endpoints.
Ghost Placement Fix: Prevents duplicate assignments via strict checks.
bugfixes: Planner: Automatic data refresh when opening the planner to avoid stale data.
Security Update: Permissions for team editing and member management have been tightened.
UI Improvement: Edit buttons are now only visible to captains.

features: New Help Center: centralized guides, FAQs, and support contact.
Enhanced Member Management: Manage invites ('Pending' status) and remove members.
Role Management: New 'Make Captain' and 'Remove Captain' button actions.
Security Update: Double confirmation required when deleting a team.
Passwordless Login: Sign in via Email (Magic Link) is now supported.
Team Invites: Invite people via email and link them to existing paddlers.
technical: New API endpoint for contact support form.

features: Export Improvements: Date in filename and clean image without UI controls.
Layout Optimization: Squad and Boat windows now align in height.
Guest Management: Consistent new interface for adding guests.
The training date is now displayed in the header title.
Legal: Added Imprint, Privacy Policy, and Safety Disclaimers.
Smoother animations during navigation and loading.
technical: Switched to server-side calculation for balance stats (Privacy).
Modernized image export function for better compatibility.
Optimized loading behavior prevents flickering at startup.
bugfixes: Fix: Profile menu was partially hidden in planner view.

features: You can now sign in with your Google or GitHub account.
Your profile picture is now displayed in the member list.
Paddlers can be linked to user accounts ‚Äì so you can see who belongs to which account.
Your settings (theme, language, active team) are now saved and available on all your devices.
Notifications now appear as beautiful popups instead of browser dialogs.
technical: Unified input fields for better readability in dark mode.
Improved spacing and separators in the header area.
Form validation optimized.

features: You can now manage multiple teams and switch between them.
New team management page: Create, edit, and delete teams.
Your data is now securely stored in the cloud ‚Äì no more data loss when switching browsers.
Teams can now be personalized with logo, website, and social media links.
technical: Migrated from LocalStorage to PostgreSQL database.
PWA install button moved to footer.
Standardized page width across all pages.

features: New boat type: Small boat with 10 seats now available.
Standard and small boats have separate seating plans.
The balance display now shows more clearly how the weight is distributed.
Swap paddlers: Simply click on two occupied seats to swap the paddlers.
Selected paddlers are now highlighted even on occupied seats.
technical: Improved help texts in planning mode.

features: New animated dragon boat graphic on the landing page.
The landing page now also supports dark mode.
bugfixes: The app now opens correctly when launched from the home screen.

technical: Added API interface for automatic boat seating.
Created API documentation with Swagger.
Introduced automated tests and quality assurance.

features: The app is now available in German and English.
Your language is detected automatically.
Dark mode now automatically matches your system settings.
bugfixes: Various speed and stability improvements.

features: Interactive tutorials show you how everything works.
Help content now adapts to where you are in the app.
The automatic seating feature is now called "Magic AI".
technical: All dialog windows now have a unified design.

features: New cleaner design in the header area.
Added imprint and legal information.
Dark mode toggle improved.
Manage your team: Add paddlers and edit their data.
Plan trainings and regattas with attendance tracking.
Fill your boat via drag & drop or let Magic AI do it for you.
See at a glance how the weight is distributed in the boat.

confirmLeaveTeamBody: Are you sure you want to leave this team? You will lose access to all events and data.
confirmRemoveMemberBody: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the team? They will lose access to internal events.
contactDesc: Have a feature request, found a bug, or have a question? Write directly to the developer (Jan).
contactError: Error sending message. Please try again later.
contactSent: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
deleteLinkedPaddlerWarning: This will remove the user from the team!
deleteTeamWarning: Deleting a team will permanently remove all its paddlers and events.
dragDropOrClick: Click to upload or Drag & Drop
emailAlreadyInvited: This email has already been invited
emailFooterAuto: This email was generated automatically. Please do not reply directly to this message.
emailMagicLinkBody: Click the button below to sign in to Drachenboot Manager. No password needed!
emailMagicLinkExpiry: This link is valid for 24 hours and can only be used once.
emailMagicLinkHint: If the button doesn't work, copy this link into your browser:
emailMagicLinkSubject: Your Login Link for Drachenboot Manager
emailNotReceived: Didn't receive it? Check your spam folder.
emailPaymentActionRequiredBody: Your latest payment requires additional confirmation (3D Secure). Please complete the process to avoid losing PRO benefits.
emailPaymentFailedBody: We were unable to process your latest payment for the PRO subscription. Please update your payment details to verify your subscription.
emailSentBody: We sent you a login link. Click the link in the email to sign in.
emailTeamInviteBody: You've been invited to join the team "{teamName}".
emailTeamInviteBodyWithInviter: {inviterName} has invited you to join the team "{teamName}".
emailTeamInviteExpiry: This link is valid for 7 days. Contact your team captain if you need a new invitation.
emailTeamInviteInfo: Click the button below to sign in and join the team. You can then set your weight and paddling skills.
emailTeamInviteLinkHint: Or copy this link to your browser:
emailTeamInviteSubject: You've been invited to a team
emailTeamRemovalBody: Hello {name}, you are no longer part of the team "{teamName}".
emailTeamRemovalReason: If you think this was a mistake, please contact your team captain.
emailTeamRemovalSubject: You have been removed from the team
emailTrialEndingBody: We hope you are enjoying Dragonboat Manager PRO! Your trial period is coming to an end. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled.
emailWelcomeBody: With the Drachenboot Manager, you can manage your team, plan trainings, and find the perfect boat lineup.
emailWelcomeIntro: Welcome to Drachenboot Manager. We're excited to have you on board!
emailWelcomeLinkHint: If the button doesn't work, copy this link into your browser:
errorGlobalMessage: A critical error occurred and the application could not be loaded.
errorNotFoundMessage: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
errorRemovingCanister: Error removing canister. Please try again.
errorUpdateBoatSize: Error updating boat size. Please try again.
errorUserNotFound: User not found. Please ask them to sign up first.
eventTemplateColumns: Title | Date | Time | Type | BoatSize | Comment
faqCreateTeamAnswer: Click on the team name in the main menu (top left), select 'Switch Team', and then click the '+' symbol.
faqCreateTeamTitle: How do I create a new team?
faqLeaveTeamAnswer: You can leave a team anytime via your user profile:
faqLeaveTeamStep1: Click on your profile picture/avatar (top right).
faqLeaveTeamTitle: How do I leave a team?
faqNoLeaveButtonAnswer: As a Captain, you are responsible for the team. To leave, you must either delete the team in settings or promote another user to Captain (and demote yourself). Only then will the option appear.
faqNoLeaveButtonTitle: I don't see the 'Leave Team' button?
faqSetStrokeAnswer: There are two ways to define fixed stroke paddlers:
faqSetStrokeMethod1: 1. Via Profile: Activate the 'Stroke' special role for the paddler. Magic AI will prioritize placing them in the first row.
faqSetStrokeMethod2: 2. In the Boat: Manually place the paddler in seat 1 and click the 'Pin Needle' (top left of the seat). This fixes them in place, even when Magic AI recalculates.
faqSetStrokeTitle: How can I set fixed stroke paddlers?
faqWeightChangeAnswer: Your Team Captain can update your weight and paddling side to optimize the boat planning. Your own changes will overwrite this, but it's best to coordinate with your Captain.

featureLineup.benefit1Desc: Even weight distribution in the boat.
featureLineup.benefit2Desc: Adjust bow or stern heaviness precisely.
featureLineup.benefit3Desc: Manual adjustments have never been easier.
featureLineup.description: Create the perfect boat lineup in seconds. Our AI considers weight, side, and skills.
featureLineup.subtitle: The ultimate AI seating planner for your team
featureLineup.title: Dragon Boat Lineup

guestHint: Note: Guests can still be added to individual trainings.
helpBoatManning1: Click on a paddler in the list to select them.
helpBoatManning2: Then click on an empty seat in the boat.
helpBoatManning3: To remove someone, hover over the seat and click the small X.
helpBoatManning4: Use the pin needle (top left of seat) to lock a paddler. They won't be moved by Magic AI.
helpBoatManningSwap: Click on another occupied seat to swap the paddlers.
helpBoatSizeDesc: Switch between Standard (20) and Small (10) boat. Each size has its own completely separate plan.
helpCalculation1: Standard (20): Split at middle (Rows 1-5 Front, 6-10 Back).
helpCalculation2: Special roles help guide the Magic AI to optimally fill the boat.
helpCalculation3: Drummer counts to Front, Steer counts to Back.
helpCalculationDesc: How Balance and Trim are calculated:
helpCategoryPlannerDesc: Schedule events, plan boat seating, and track attendance.
helpCategoryTeamDesc: Create, join, and leave teams. Manage members.
helpIcal1: Paste the iCal URL of your calendar in the settings.
helpIcal2: Sync runs automatically at night or can be triggered manually.
helpIcalDesc: Automatically sync your team with an external calendar (e.g. Kadermanager). You can find this option in Team Settings.
helpIcalWarning: Important: Events deleted in the external calendar will also be removed from the app during the next sync.
helpImport3: Upload your file (.xlsx or .csv) - Roles like Steer/Drum are automatically detected
helpImportDesc: Import large amounts of paddlers or events via Excel or CSV. Perfect for season start.
helpIntroDesc: Find guides and answers to common questions here.
helpLeaveTeamDesc: Paddlers can leave the team anytime via the user menu. As a Captain, you don't have this option directly: You must promote another Captain (and demote yourself) or delete the team entirely.
helpManageEvents1: Create new trainings or regattas using the form on the left.
helpManageEvents2: Click Plan to start boat manning for an event.
helpManageEvents3: Manage attendance directly in the event list.
helpMembers1: Add new members using the form.
helpMembers2: Edit members by clicking the pencil icon in the squad list.
helpMembers3: Delete members with the trash icon (requires 2x confirmation).
helpSpecialItems2: Guest: Add temporary paddlers not in the squad.
helpTeamEditGeneralDesc: Here you can manage the basic information of your team. Change the team name, update the website, or upload a new team logo to make your team recognizable. Social media links can also be managed here.
helpTeamEditMembersDesc: Manage who has access to your team here. You can invite new members via email. You can assign roles to existing members: 'Captain' for full administrative rights or 'Paddler' for regular team members. If necessary, you can also remove members.
helpToolsDesc: Use the slider for trim and Magic AI for auto-fill.
helpToolsStats1: Magic AI: The wand automatically fills the boat optimally.
helpToolsStats2: Trim: Use the slider to adjust target weight (Bow/Stern).
helpToolsStats3: Export: Save the lineup as an image.
icalDescription: Synchronize training sessions automatically from an external calendar (e.g. Kadermanager).
importLimitWarning: This import would bring your total to {total}, exceeding the limit of {max}.
imprintCopyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this page was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are observed. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
imprintLiabilityContentText: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws pursuant to ¬ß 7 Para.1 TMG. According to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with general laws remain unaffected by this. However, liability in this respect is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. As soon as we become aware of such infringements, we will remove this content immediately.
imprintLiabilityLinksText: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
inviteDescription: The person will be added to the team. If they don't have an account yet, they can sign up and will automatically be part of the team.
inviteEmailHint: If provided, an invitation email will be sent
landingFeature1Desc: Perfect boat lineup in 3 seconds. Our AI considers balance, trim, and side preferences.
landingFeature2Desc: Whether Standard (20s) or Small Boat (10s) - plan intuitively via drag & drop for every race class.
landingFeature3Desc: A paddler drops out last minute? No problem. Adjust the lineup right at the dock on your smartphone.
landingFeature4Desc: Coaching multiple teams? No problem. Manage different squads and switch between them instantly.
landingFeature5Desc: Your data is safe. Hosted in Frankfurt, developed with 'Privacy First' principles.
landingFeature6Desc: Developed from personal experience as a team captain to solve a real problem in dragon boat racing.
landingFeaturesSubtitle: Focus on the sport, we'll handle the organization.
landingHeroSubtitle: The ultimate manager for Dragonboat teams. Plan trainings, manage lineups, and stay on top.
landingTeamsUsingSubtitle: Paddlers worldwide rely on Drachenboot Manager

legal.agbConsent: I agree to the [AGB] and [Privacy Policy].

avv.conclusion_text: By registering and using the service, you accept our Terms of Service. These include or reference the conclusion of a data processing agreement (DPA).
avv.note_text: If you use "Drachenboot Manager" for your club, company or other organization and process personal data of third parties (e.g. team members), this is done within the framework of data processing according to Art. 28 GDPR.
avv.subject: Subject of processing:
avv.subject_text: Use of the software for organizing dragon boat teams, managing participant lists, weight information and role assignments.
avv.title: DPA-Note (Data Processing)
avv.tom_text: We use modern security standards to protect your data, including encryption (SSL/TLS), hosting in Frankfurt, regular backups and access restrictions.

disclaimer.safety: Safety Notice: The calculations provided in this application (e.g., for balance and trim) are for assistance and guidance only. They do not replace the professional judgment and responsibility of the boat captain. Use at your own risk.
disclaimer.tech_info: Built with Next.js, Vercel, Prisma & Resend.
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer & Technical Notices
disclaimer.warranty: Software Warranty: The software is provided 'as is', without warranty of any kind, express or implied. No guarantee is made for error-free operation or continuous availability.

imprint.name: Jan Hartje
imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.ustId: According to ¬ß 19 UStG (German Small Business Act), no sales tax is charged.

privacy.analytics_text: We use Vercel Analytics and Speed Insights to statistically evaluate the use of our website. Data is generally collected anonymously.
privacy.auth_text: You can log in via Google or GitHub. In doing so, data is transmitted to us by the respective provider (e-mail, name, profile picture). Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (performance of contract).
privacy.database_text: Our database is provided by Vercel Postgres and is also hosted in Frankfurt. Your user data (name, email, team data) is stored here.
privacy.emails_text: We use Resend to send system emails. Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in reliable communication).
privacy.hosting_text: We host our website with Vercel. The provider is Vercel Inc, 440 N Barranca Ave #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA. Server location: Frankfurt, Germany. Vercel is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.
privacy.intro_text: This privacy policy informs you about how Jan Hartje (hereinafter "we") processes personal data in the context of using the "Drachenboot Manager".
privacy.payments_text: We use Stripe for paid functions. Stripe processes payment data and information for fraud prevention. Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, rectification, deletion, and restriction of the processing of your data as well as the right to data portability.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

expiry.content: The right of withdrawal expires early in the case of a contract for the supply of digital content if you have expressly agreed that we begin the execution of the contract before the expiration of the withdrawal period, and you have confirmed your knowledge that you lose your right of withdrawal by doing so.
expiry.title: Early Expiration

form.content: If you wish to withdraw from the contract, please send us an email with the following data: I/we hereby withdraw from the contract concluded by me/us for the purchase of the following goods/provision of the following service, Ordered on/Received on, Name, Address, Date.
form.title: Model Withdrawal Form

revocation.intro: Consumers generally have a fourteen-day right of withdrawal.

right.content: You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.
right.title: Right of Withdrawal

revocation.title: Right of Withdrawal for Digital Content

legal.revocationWaiver: I agree that the execution of the contract begins before the expiration of the withdrawal period and I lose my right of withdrawal.

tos.conclusion_text: The contract is concluded by completing the registration process and (for paid subscriptions) by completing the payment process.
tos.liability_text1: 1. The Provider is liable without limitation in cases of intent or gross negligence.
tos.liability_text2: 2. In cases of slight negligence, the Provider is only liable for the breach of an essential contractual obligation (cardinal obligation). In this case, liability is limited to the contract-typical, foreseeable damage.
tos.prices_text: The prices stated at the time the contract is concluded shall apply. The Provider is a small business within the meaning of ¬ß 19 UStG (German Small Business Act); therefore, no sales tax is charged or shown. Payment processing is handled via the service provider Stripe.
tos.scope_text: These Terms apply to all contracts between Jan Hartje (hereinafter "Provider") and his customers regarding the use of the software "Drachenboot Manager" (hereinafter "Software").
tos.subject: 2. Subject Matter and Services
tos.subject_text: The Provider makes the software available to the Customer as a SaaS solution. The scope of functions results from the service description on the website. In the free version ("Free"), the scope of functions is limited. The paid version ("PRO") offers extended functions.
tos.term_text1: 1. The free version can be terminated at any time by deleting the account.
tos.term_text2: 2. Paid subscriptions have the selected term (monthly/yearly) and are automatically renewed unless they are cancelled before the end of the respective period.
tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.withdrawal_expiry: Special note on the expiry of the right of withdrawal:
tos.withdrawal_expiry_text: The right of withdrawal expires in the case of a contract for the supply of digital content not stored on a tangible medium if we have begun performance of the contract after you have expressly consented to our beginning performance of the contract before the end of the withdrawal period and you have confirmed your knowledge that you lose your right of withdrawal by your consent as soon as performance of the contract begins.
tos.withdrawal_text: You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason. The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day the contract is concluded. To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us (Jan Hartje, Hamburger Allee 6, 30161 Hannover, support@dragonboatmanager.com) by means of a clear statement of your decision.

linkAccountHint: If the email has an account, the paddler will be linked. Otherwise, an invitation will be sent.
managedByOther: The subscription is managed by another team member.

metadata.description: Plan your dragon boat team efficiently: member management, event planning, and optimal boat lineup with AI support.

title.default: Dragon Boat Manager - Team & Boat Lineup Planning

name: Name
onboardingBody: To help your coach plan and balance the boat optimally, we need a few details from you.
onlyCaptainsCanEditTeam: Only team captains can edit team settings and manage members.
paddlerAlreadyLinked: Paddler is already linked to an account

pro.balanceMinimumNote: Open amounts are collected until the minimum charge of ‚Ç¨0.50 is reached.
pro.cancelInfo: You can continue using the features until the end of the current period.
pro.canceledAtPeriodEnd: Will be canceled at period end
pro.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
pro.freeUpgradeDescription: Your promotion covers 100% of the cost. No payment method required.
pro.helpCategoryProDesc: Everything about PRO membership and exclusive features.
pro.helpProBillingDesc: You can manage your subscription anytime in the team settings. There you will also find your invoices and can update your payment method.
pro.helpProFeature1: Unlimited Members: Manage as many paddlers as you want without restrictions.
pro.helpProFeature2: PDF & Image Export: Save your boat lineups in high quality for printing or sharing.
pro.helpProFeature3: Team Customization: Choose your own accent color and activate the premium logo ring.
pro.helpProFeature4: iCal Integration: Sync your events directly with your personal calendar (Outlook, Google, Apple).
pro.helpProFeaturesDesc: As a PRO team, you have access to the following features:
pro.imageFormats: Max. 5MB. Formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP.
pro.manageSubscriptionDesc: Your team is PRO! View invoices and update payment details here.
pro.managedByOther: This subscription is managed by another team member.
pro.noSubscriptionDesc: This team does not have an active PRO subscription.
pro.showOnWebsiteDesc: Display your team logo and name on the public landing page as a reference for other teams.
pro.showPremiumRingDesc: Show a shimmering golden ring around your team logo.
pro.showProBadgeDesc: Displays the PRO badge in the header and team switcher.
pro.showWatermarkDesc: Shows "Created with Drachenboot Manager" on image exports. Can be disabled for PRO teams.

errors.card_declined: Your card was declined. Please contact your bank.
errors.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.fraudulent: The payment was flagged as fraudulent.
errors.incorrect_cvc: Your card's security code is incorrect.
errors.lost_card: Your card was reported as lost.
errors.processing_error: An error occurred while processing your card.
errors.stolen_card: Your card was reported as stolen.

pro.unlockFeaturesDescription: Get unlimited members, import/export functionality, and priority support.
pro.upgradeDescription: Get unlimited members, MCP access for AI, and watermark-free exports.
pro.upgradeSuccessMessage: Your team has been successfully upgraded to PRO. Enjoy the new features!

profileGlobalHint: Name & Weight apply to all teams.
profileLocalHint: Skills apply only to this team.
skillRequired: Please select at least one side/role.
skillsReason: Your preferred position (left/right/drum/steer) helps with creating the seating plan.
strokeDesc: Prioritized for the first occupied row
teamLimitReachedDesc: You have reached the limit of {max} members. Upgrade to PRO for unlimited access.
title: Title
tourBoatDesc: Click seats to assign/unassign. Click two seats to swap.
tourBoatSizeDesc: Switch between Standard (20) and Small (10) boat planning.
tourCanisterDesc: Add a dummy paddler (25kg) for balance.
tourEventListDesc: Here you see all upcoming events. Click on one to plan.
tourExportDesc: Download the plan as an image.
tourGuestDesc: Add a guest paddler for this event only.
tourMagicAIDesc: Let the AI fill the boat optimally.
tourMembersDesc: Add new paddlers to your team here.
tourNewEventDesc: Create a new training session or regatta here.
tourPoolDesc: Drag & Drop or click paddlers to assign them.
tourSquadDesc: Overview of all your paddlers and their stats.
tourStatsDesc: Monitor balance and trim. Use tools like Magic AI or Export.
tourWelcomeDesc: A short tour to show you the most important features.
userAlreadyMember: User is already a team member
weightDisclaimer: Your weight is visible only to team captains for boat balancing.
weightReason: Your weight is visible only to you and the coach. It is essential for calculating the boat's balance (trim).
welcomeCreateDesc: Are you the captain? Create your team and invite members.
welcomeFeature1Desc: Add paddlers, manage weights and skills for optimal boat placement.
welcomeFeature2Desc: Create trainings and regattas, track attendance easily.
welcomeFeature3Desc: Let Magic AI calculate the perfect lineup in seconds.
welcomeJoinDesc: Your team already uses Dragonboat Manager?
welcomeJoinHint: Ask your team captain to invite you via your email address.
welcomeSubtitle: Plan trainings, manage your team, and find the perfect boat lineup ‚Äì all in one place.
